attributes.action: Ensure all high street retailers offer customers an email copy of their receipts
attributes.additional_details:
Most retailers do not offer to replace or return an item if the customer cannot show a receipt of purchase. Maintaining a bunch of such receipts creates unnecessary pressure on the customer. Moreover being printed on paper they are not exactly environment friendly. 
Hence, I seek to ask the government to make it mandatory for all high street retailers to offer customers the ability to email them their receipts.
attributes.background: Enact a rule so that all high street retailers are required to offer customers the ability to have their receipts emailed to them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for retailers.
